articles.title: Patriots get bad news with injuries ahead of Bucs matchup
articles.description:
Garrett Bradbury, Kayshon Boutte, and Rhamondre Stevenson didn't practice on Wednesday.

The post Patriots get bad news with injuries ahead of Bucs matchup appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Garrett Bradbury, Kayshon Boutte, and Rhamondre Stevenson missed practice on November 1.
Patriots face the Buccaneers on November 5, increasing pressure on remaining players.
Injuries may affect team performance, impacting local fans' expectations for the game.

articles.title: Boston youth baseball coach pleads not guilty to drug trafficking charge
articles.description:
The coach is facing a felony charge because he was allegedly trafficking more than 10 grams of fentanyl, court records show.

The post Boston youth baseball coach pleads not guilty to drug trafficking charge appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston youth baseball coach pleads not guilty to drug trafficking charges.
Coach allegedly trafficked over 10 grams of fentanyl, facing felony charges.
Local youth sports community concerned about safety and reputation.

articles.title: Education technology company to close Boston headquarters, embrace fully remote workplace
articles.description:
Cengage Group has based its corporate headquarters in Boston since 2014, with offices downtown and in the Seaport.

The post Education technology company to close Boston headquarters, embrace fully remote workplace appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Cengage Group will close its Boston headquarters, transitioning to a fully remote workplace.
The company has operated in Boston since 2014, with offices in downtown and the Seaport.
This closure may affect local jobs and the downtown office market in Boston.

articles.title: What Patriots players did during their off day that impressed Mike Vrabel
articles.description:
“I feel like — don't drink the Kool-Aid. Don't get too comfortable. I mean, records are gonna be records.

The post What Patriots players did during their off day that impressed Mike Vrabel appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots players utilized their off day for workouts, impressing coach Mike Vrabel.
Vrabel emphasized the importance of staying focused and not getting complacent.
This dedication may enhance team performance for Boston fans this season.

articles.title: Officials identify two killed in apparent murder-suicide in Beverly
articles.description:
Becky Lynn Center, 58, and John Patrick Nesbitt, 56, were both found dead at a home on Colonial Drive on Monday.

The post Officials identify two killed in apparent murder-suicide in Beverly appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Becky Lynn Center, 58, and John Patrick Nesbitt, 56, found dead in Beverly home.
Incident occurred on Colonial Drive on Monday, raising community safety concerns.
Local authorities are investigating the circumstances, impacting residents' sense of security.
